title: Flow Rate Formula
text: Use the formula for volume flow rate: $$Q=A v$$ where Q is the volume flow rate, A is the cross-sectional area, and v is the speed of the flow.

title: The Equation for Conservation of Flow Rate
text: Since the flow rate must be conserved as the blood moves from the capillaries to the venules, we have: $$A_c v_c=A_v v_v$$

title: Solve for $$A_c$$
text: Given that $$v_v=4v_c$$, solve for $$A_c$$ in $${cm}^2$$: $$A_c v_c=10{cm}^2\times4 v_c$$
